title: The Price of Glee
overview: The cultural phenomenon and hit musical series, "Glee," catapulted a cast of relative unknowns into international superstardom and literally rocked pop culture. But, the show that sparked a new era of acceptance was also saddled with extreme devastation on the inside. Endless scandals, tabloid gossip and fatal tragedies plagued the rising stars on what was supposed to be the most joyful show on television. Now, ID pulls back the curtain on "Glee" to explore the harsh reality of fame with the three-part limited series, The Price of Glee.
